description:
In this course titled 'Hypnosis - Heal General Illness For Mental Wellness Using Self Hypnosis.' By Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn -

  • The psychological reasons behind general illness affecting your mental and physical wellness
  • You will be able to manage your general illness with the powerful techniques of self hypnosis, visualization, imagery and affirmations
  • You will be able to relax instantly using self hypnosis techniques
  • You will be able to reduce stress, depression , insomnia and negativity using powerful self hypnosis and affirmations

This course is a must for those who are suffering from general health issues and are unable to get rid of the problems mentally and physically.

It is ideal for everyone who want to heal their general health and improve their mental health

This course contains a lot of exercises and more than 30 minutes of live video content designed over 9 lectures in English including bonuses.

This course contains-

Lecture1:Introduction

Lecture2:Remove Myths About Self Hypnosis

Lecture3:Conscious Mind Vs Subconscious Mind

Lecture4:How To Enter Into The State Of Self Hypnosis

Lecture5:How To Master Self Hypnosis To Reprogram Your Subconscious Mind

Lecture 6:Guided Visualization Exercise: To Heal General Illness

oLecture7:Summary

Lecture8:Bonus Exercise - Affirmations For Depression, Stress, Insomnia And Negativity

Lecture 9:Bonus Exercise : General Healing Audio File
title: Hypnosis- Heal General Illness For Mental Wellness
